ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] new topic ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: Afterlife http://www.afterlifeguild.org the loot system is under DKP System on the left.  The Current Standings are, well, current.  the ideas in the
ygData.messageBody:
Afterlife

http://www.afterlifeguild.org

the loot system is under DKP System on the left. The Current Standings are,
well, current. the ideas in the Explanation are basically up-to-date,
though rather than pre-kunark mobs that it lists now it is Trak, VS, the 3
outdoor dragons, epic weapon quest mobs, and some PoS stuff. but the Values
page is way way way out-of-date (all pre-kunark items listed there). the
best way to see what current item values are is on the current standings
under some players (i.e. kunark class armor BP=20, legs=15, epic weapon=20,
etc.). old DKP values were set values. now they are usually the same
(Trak=1, VS=0.8, Talendor=0.5, etc.) but can vary based on how many people
are on the raid and the total value of what drops. e.g. if VS drops 2 legs
it is probably 0.8 per person, if he drops 2 staffs it may be 0.5.

oh well i am getting too detailed, basically most of the new stuff is
determined by the officers and known by the guild, so this stuff may be
out-of-date but if you have any questions you can e-mail me.

Shada


> which guild are you in and what's their website? i'd be interested in
> checking out the points scheme.
